ViewObject.Name: PastQuarterSalesViewObjVO_rs
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT TO_CHAR(opportunity_close_date, 'yyyy-q') as Quarter ,sum(revenue) as total from opportunity WHERE EXTRACT( YEAR FROM opportunity_close_date) >= EXTRACT(YEAR FROM sysdate)-1 and ((extract( year from opportunity_close_date)<extract(year from sysdate)) and (to_char(opportunity_close_date,'Q')>=to_char(sysdate,'Q'))) or ((extract( year from opportunity_close_date)=extract(year from sysdate))and (to_char(opportunity_close_date,'Q')<to_char(sysdate,'Q'))) GROUP BY to_char(opportunity_close_date,'yyyy-q')
